entry.title: The Queen's Journey to Her Final Resting Place
entry.content: Queen Elizabeth’s funeral, set for Monday, will offer pageantry and one last opportunity for well-wishers to bid farewell to the long-lived monarch.

entry.title: Oktoberfest Restarts in Munich After Two Years but Beermakers Face Inflation Headache
entry.content: Oktoberfest is kicking off after a Covid-induced two-year lull, but German brewers are feeling the fallout from Russia’s invasion of Ukraine, its energy war on Europe and the lingering effects of the pandemic.
